channel.title: Tyrannus - Economy based 474 (Need Developers, Experienced Users Only)
channel.description:
[center]Hi there, My name is Devin, or, [i]Tyrannus[/i]. I am an Undergraduate Computer Science Major, specializing in Generalized programming. I have 3 years University level training in C#, Java, PhP, Python, MySQL, and Perl. Before going off to college, I had several years experience in Programming RSPS, on these forums, under a different Alias. Our server was quite successful. And now I am returning to the community to start a serious project that I hope will go far.[/center]
I am looking to start an Emulation project using the 474 revision, loading a higher cache (Not sure what revision yet). I intend to go the distance on this project, and am looking for people who are committed, experienced, and willing to follow direction. Obviously looking for users on this forum with only similar experience and training would be quite extreme, however, I do have a few required Specifications if you intend to work on this project.
[b]Experience Requirements:[/b]
[ul][li]Minimum 2 Years Programming Experience (Varies depending on job duties, [e.g. Web developer will require 2 Years Web Development Experience])[/li] [li]Ability to work at a mature level, on a serious project, with a serious goal. I will not tolerate immature behavior.[/li] [li]Must have Flexible availability through-out the week.[/li][/ul]
I will be paying the full service fee of getting the server started. Including purchasing a Dedicated Server to host our Website and Server from. I will be handling all Financial Aspects of getting us online, and getting us presentable, professional forums.
We will not be going Live until after our Development stage is completed (Estimated 2-3 weeks time before Beta Server Launch)
I will be hiring for 5 Positions, please feel free to send me a Personal Message with any additional reasons, beyond the application format, why you think you want to work on this project.
[u][b]Available Positions:[/b][/u] [b]Lead Content Developer[/b] - Tyrannus [b]Sub-Content Developer[/b] - OPEN [b]Web Developer/Administrator[/b] - OPEN [b]Lead Graphics Designer[/b] - OPEN [b]Dedicated Server Administrator[/b] - OPEN [i](Position not being filled until server is Live)[/i] [b]Customer Support Administrator[/b] - OPEN [i](Position not being filled until server is Live)[/i]
Application Format: [code]Name: Age: Position Applying For: Applicable Experience: Additional Skills: Why do you want to Join this Project: Are you Familiar with Group Conference Programs?: Time Zone: Average Availability: Skype/MSN: Please link some example(s) of your previous work, in regards to the Position you are applying for:[/code]
More information will be posted as this project evolves. Thank you for your time.

item.title: Tyrannus - Economy based 474 (Need Developers, Experienced Users Only)
item.dc:creator: @Tyrannus Tyrannus
item.description:
@Tyrannus wrote:

[center]Hi there,
My name is Devin, or, Tyrannus.
I am an Undergraduate Computer Science Major, specializing in Generalized programming.
I have 3 years University level training in C#, Java, PhP, Python, MySQL, and Perl.
Before going off to college, I had several years experience in Programming RSPS, on these forums, under a different Alias. Our server was quite successful.
And now I am returning to the community to start a serious project that I hope will go far.[/center]

I am looking to start an Emulation project using the 474 revision, loading a higher cache (Not sure what revision yet). I intend to go the distance on this project, and am looking for people who are committed, experienced, and willing to follow direction.
Obviously looking for users on this forum with only similar experience and training would be quite extreme, however, I do have a few required Specifications if you intend to work on this project.

Experience Requirements:

[ul][li]Minimum 2 Years Programming Experience (Varies depending on job duties, [e.g. Web developer will require 2 Years Web Development Experience])[/li]
[li]Ability to work at a mature level, on a serious project, with a serious goal. I will not tolerate immature behavior.[/li]
[li]Must have Flexible availability through-out the week.[/li][/ul]

I will be paying the full service fee of getting the server started. Including purchasing a Dedicated Server to host our Website and Server from.
I will be handling all Financial Aspects of getting us online, and getting us presentable, professional forums.

We will not be going Live until after our Development stage is completed (Estimated 2-3 weeks time before Beta Server Launch)

I will be hiring for 5 Positions, please feel free to send me a Personal Message with any additional reasons, beyond the application format, why you think you want to work on this project.

Available Positions:
Lead Content Developer - Tyrannus
Sub-Content Developer - OPEN
Web Developer/Administrator - OPEN
Lead Graphics Designer - OPEN
Dedicated Server Administrator - OPEN (Position not being filled until server is Live)
Customer Support Administrator - OPEN (Position not being filled until server is Live)

Application Format:

Name: Age: Position Applying For: Applicable Experience: Additional Skills: Why do you want to Join this Project: Are you Familiar with Group Conference Programs?: Time Zone: Average Availability: Skype/MSN: Please link some example(s) of your previous work, in regards to the Position you are applying for:

More information will be posted as this project evolves.
Thank you for your time.
